member.name: T:Basic_ORM.BL.Interface.IDataHandler`1
member.summary: Interface for handling data operations of a specific type.
member.typeparam: The type of data to handle.

member.name: P:Basic_ORM.BL.Interface.IDataHandler`1.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of operation (e.g., Edit, Add).

member.name: M:Basic_ORM.BL.Interface.IDataHandler`1.PreSave(`0)
member.summary: Performs pre-save operations on the data object before saving.
member.param: The data object to be saved.

member.name: M:Basic_ORM.BL.Interface.IDataHandler`1.Validation
member.summary: Validates the data before saving.
member.returns: A response indicating whether the validation was successful.

member.name: M:Basic_ORM.BL.Interface.IDataHandler`1.Save
member.summary: Saves the data.
member.returns: A response indicating the result of the save operation.
